questions.question: 1. ____________technique is using to record the current by stepping the voltage to find currents for plotting V-I curve.

answers.c: Both Voltage clamp and Current clamp

questions.question: 2. __ drug is used as sodium ion channel blocker for calculating reverse potential which is created because of the flow of Na+ ions.
3. In electrophysiology V-I curves are mainly used to estimate _____

answers.a: Reversal potential and conductance of ion channels
